charges.charge_disposition: REVOCATION SENTENCE:  THE DEFENDANT: admitted guilt to violation of conditions of the term of supervision. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 33 Months. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 2 Years.  AMENDED SENTENCE REDUCED PURSUANT TO CRACK COCAINE 750 AMENDMENT:  IT IS ORDERED that the motion is: GRANTED and the defendants previously imposed sentence of imprisonment (as reflected in the last judgment issued) of 98 months is reduced to time served, plus 30 days  AMENDED JUDGMENT: The term of imprisonment has been amended to read: IMPRISONMENT - The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 120 months on Count 1. The Defendant should get credit for time in federal custody beginning February 9, 2006. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. All other information remains unchanged from the original judgment. ORIGINAL JUDGMENT: The defendant pleaded guilty to Count 1 of the Information on October 21, 2003. The Indictment in case 03-00021-5-CR-W-NKL is dismissed on the motion of the government. IMPRISONMENT - The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 240 months on Count 1, to run consecutive to the sentence imposed in Case Number CR94-6502. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE - Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 8 years. Standard and special conditions of supervision are requested. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES - MSA $100; No fine; No restitution.  SENTENCE REDUCED PURSUANT TO CRACK COCAINE AMENDMENT 706:  X GRANTED and the defendants previously imposed sentence of imprisonment (as reflected in the last judgment issued) of 120 months on * months is reduced to 98 months on count 1. *count 1, the defendant should get credit for time in federal custody beginning 02/09/2006.  SENTENCE REDUCED PURSUANT TO CRACK COCAINE AMENDMENT 750:  IT IS ORDERED that the motion is GRANTED and the defendant's previously imposed sentence of imprisonment (as reflected in the last judgment issued) of 98 mos. is reduced to time served, stayed for 15 days.
